statements: DELETE FROM festival_tickets WHERE tickets_sold < 100 AND attendance > 500;
DELETE FROM festival_attendance WHERE total_attendees > 500 AND attendance_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_price > 100 AND sale_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM festivals WHERE festival_date < '2023-06-15' AND total_revenue <= 5000;
DELETE FROM festival WHERE festival_name = 'Summer Music Fest';
DELETE FROM festival WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND location = 'New York';
